title: Middle Colonies claim not a region

content.prompt: Landsman claims that some historians might not consider the Middle Colonies a single British colonial region because the Middle Colonies

choices.label: contained multiple inland waterways for commerce
were settled by ethnically diverse groups of Europeans
received European immigrants who practiced a variety of religions
had different local economies focused on Philadelphia and New York City

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
